ygData.subject: Re: Neriak Robes
ygData.msgSnippet: You can get a nice red robe in Erud or a nice Blue robe in Qeynos the red one is the better of them though ... ~    Auraelle Dracul      ~ ~Priestess of
ygData.messageBody:
You can get a nice red robe in Erud or a nice Blue robe in Qeynos

the red one is the better of them though

:)

~ Auraelle Dracul ~
~Priestess of Veeshan~
~ Follower of Tunare ~
~ Lords of Light ~

From: mstokes <mstokes@...>

Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Neriak Robes


> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>

secure
